elements.name: p1EarlyFormDownloadExplanation
elements.title:
Notice of Proposed Application in Relation to Estate (P1)
The form that is being generated is for you to deliver to other people. Read this form as if are receiving this document, not the person who is giving the document. It tells people what you are trying to do and it outlines their rights to respond if they want to.
Download and Review
[JIRA Download Link]

elements.name: question417
elements.title:
